column5: Well left work last night and hit the peir for some perch ...  After that Sonny pulls up ask me if i wana go after some Walleye ...so off i went ...never really fished walleye at night before so we headed to one of my spots on the Lower Grand and it wasn't long Sonny had a nice fish on ...  then another ...ok my turn .  then all of a sudden Sonny says im snaged i thought diffrent as i was running the boat aroud 2.8miles a hr and this line was screaming 20 miles a hr i knew it wasnt no snag ....after about 15 mintues i said to him i have got big carp in the tail while trolling ...and sure enough after a 20 minute battle up comes a big carp right by the tail ..lol ...well here is the screamer  ...Thanks Sonny for taken me out fishing ..Fishmaster
what were the perch hitting steve?  slipfloat and shiner setup? inside the canal or outside?  good job guys
Those are some great looking Walleyes, and one killer carp. Good show.
Crappie rigs with a 1/2oz sinker and 2 shinners ...they are getting the perch  all over the pier and the mouth ..
Nice catch guys!!!!!!!!    well done ,great eating size walleyes you have there......great pics   cheers

had a great time fishing the grand,,,,steve for you who don't know is a very personable guy and good company out on the water,,,,look forward to heading out for musky with him sometime soon!!! hopefully!!!
Thanks Sonny ill try to get some reports on them Muskie for next week ...see ya soon ..Fishmaster
